summary: The implementation covers most core requirements including home page with dynamic introduction, achievements section, blog functionality, contact form, AI assistant chatbot widget, and comprehensive CMS admin interface. However, critical Salesforce integration functionality is missing or not implemented, and some features appear to be simulated rather than fully functional.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend integration with Salesforce REST API to create contact/lead records in Salesforce CRM
missing_requirements.reason: The contact form submission handler in backend/main.mo does not show any Salesforce REST API integration code. The submitContactForm function only stores forms locally without making external API calls to Salesforce.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend connection to Salesforce Agentforce REST API to process user queries and return AI responses
missing_requirements.reason: The ChatWidget component contains a simulated bot response with a hardcoded message stating integration is pending. No actual Salesforce Agentforce API integration is implemented in the backend.

hallucinated_features.description: Digital Marketing Data tracking with metricName, metricValue, and timestamp fields
hallucinated_features.reason: The backend includes a digitalMarketingData map and DigitalMarketingData type that was not requested in any requirement. This appears to be additional functionality beyond the specified scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Site statistics tracking for total visits, messages, achievements, and blog posts
hallucinated_features.reason: While the BuildRequest mentions displaying content, there was no explicit requirement for tracking and displaying site-wide statistics like totalVisits or totalMessages counters.
